title: LGBTwed's Wedding "Experience" Event
desc: This is THE LGBT Wedding event of the year! The LGBTwed Wedding Experience event presented by FRONTIERS Media will begin with an incredible Sunday Brunch and then followed by a wonderous wedding expo and show. ?Each of our Experience attendees will be able to experience the TASTE of delectable morsels, SMELL incredible florals, FEEL luxurious linens, SEE stunning wedding design, HEAR alluring sounds of exclsuively planned entertainment. Plus, they will LEARN about incredible destinations, TRY custom jewelry pieces, and DESIRE exquisite fashions. This will be a wedding show unlike any before.
